participant_1.background:
I am a good listener and always there for my friends and family.
I went to the Amazon rainforest with my older brother and saw monkeys in the wild.
i work with my wife.
i like eating healthy foods.
i watch every football game at alabama.

participant_2.background:
I remember visiting the petting zoo with my parents and brother when I was a kid.
I remember playing with my siblings in the backyard and building forts.
i love computers.
I don't care about social media as much as I do about my relationships with my friends and family.
I took a long, hot bath at the beach on my last vacation.

content.text: Hello there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! How about you?
I just got back from the Amazon rainforest with my brother. It was an amazing experience!
That sounds like it was a lot of fun! I've always wanted to go to the Amazon rainforest.
It was! We saw so many amazing things, like monkeys, birds, and snakes.
It was definitely a once in a lifetime experience.
So, what's something you like to do for fun?
I love to play video games and build computers.
Oh, cool! I love video games too. What kind of games do you like to play?
I like to play all sorts of games, but I'm really into RPGs and strategy games right now.
I'm more of a casual gamer myself, but I do enjoy a good RPG every once in a while.
That's cool! I'm always looking for new people to play games with.
Me too! Maybe we could play something together sometime.
